phylosmith 0.99.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

CI_ellipse()

Creates confidence interval ellipse for scatterplot

abundance_heatmap_ggplot()

Create a heatmap ggplot object of the abundance table from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

abundance_lines_ggplot()

Create a lineplot ggplot object of the abundance table from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

arrange_co_occurrence_table()

Arrange co-occurence table

check_numeric_classification()

Converts numeric values to column names in tax_table

check_numeric_treatment()

Converts numeric values to column names in sample_data.

co_occurrence()

pair-wise Spearman rank co-occurrence, written in efficient c++ code. Function from the phylosmith-package.

co_occurrence_Rcpp()

Co-occurrence calculation

co_occurrence_rho_Rcpp()

Co-occurrence rho calculations

common_taxa()

Find taxa shared between treatments of a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

conglomerate_samples()

Merge samples based on common factor within sample_data. Function from the phylosmith-package.

conglomerate_taxa()

Conglomerate taxa by sample on a given classification level. Function from the phylosmith-package.

create_palette()

Creates color palettes for figures.

curate_co_occurrence()

Curate co-occurrence data. Function from the phylosmith-package.

histogram_permuted_rhos()

Create a ggplot object of the distribution of rho values from permute_rho(). Function from the phylosmith-package.

melt_phyloseq()

Melt a phyloseq object into a data.table. Function from the phylosmith-package.

merge_treatments()

Combine meta-data columns. Function from the phylosmith-package.

mock_phyloseq

Mock Phyloseq Object 1

mock_phyloseq_2

Mock Phyloseq Object 2

network_layout_ps()

Create an layout_igraph object of the co-occurrence from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

network_ps()

Create a node network ggplot object of the co-occurrence from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

nmds_phyloseq_ggplot()

Create a ggplot object of the NMDS from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

permute_rho()

Permutes the pair-wise Spearman rank co-occurrence, to determine a significant rho-cutoff. Function from the phylosmith-package.

phylogeny_profile_ggplot()

Create a ggplot object of the phylogenic barplots from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

phylosmith

phylosmith-package

quantile_permuted_rhos()

Calculate quantiles for the permuted rho values from the Spearman-rank co-occurrence. Function from the phylosmith-package.

relative_abundance()

Transform abundance data in an otu_table to relative abundance, sample-by-sample. Function from the phylosmith-package.

set_sample_order()

Re-orders the samples of a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

set_treatment_levels()

set_treatment_levels

soil_column

Soil Column 16S Data - OTUs

taxa_abundance_bars_ggplot()

Create a ggplot object of the abundance barplots from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

taxa_filter()

Filter taxa based on proportion of samples they are observed in. Function from the phylosmith-package.

taxa_proportions()

Compute proportions for taxa.

tsne_phyloseq_ggplot()

Create a ggplot object using t-SNE from a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.

unique_taxa()

Find unique taxa between treatments of a phyloseq object. Function from the phylosmith-package.
